column4: I have a problem in Ubuntu and it is that when write ''virtualbox'' in terminal a message appear
Could not find VirtualBox installation. Please reinstall.
and when wrote "sudo apt-get --reinstall install virtualbox-ose" in terminal this appear
it reinstall again
Could not find VirtualBox installation. Please reinstall.
any one know what is the problem with this program
try launching it through the terminal with sudo rights
Could not find VirtualBox installation. Please reinstall.
ill check..
try this one http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/3.0.4/virtualbox-3.0_3.0.4-50677_Ubuntu_jaunty_i386.deb
i tried this too
this problem is the same i have http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=5248735
: sudo dpkg -i <whatever the .deb name was>
i tried but this appear
what appears? i just installed the exact copy i gave you it worked without problems..
http://paste.ubuntu.com/250172/
so what i have to do now
try to uninstall them both
i don't know, thats why i only install .deb packages.
thanks for your time :)
the problem is solved
i wrote in the terminal "sudo apt-get autoremove virtualbox-ose" then "sudo dpkg -i <whatever the .deb name was>" and now it works
